name: Fallen Girl [LD43]
description:
How to play:

- ARROWS to move

- Z to jump and skip scenes

- Reload page to restart (I didn't have time to implement a restart function unfortunately, sorry)

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 43 by me, fullmontis.

If you liked it you can also find my other illustrations and projects on Twitter.
